verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David.) In the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> I <S%H2620>take<s%> <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> can you <S%H559>say<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H5110>"Flee<s%> [as] a <S%H6833>bird<s%> to your <S%H2022>mountain;<s%>

For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow,<s%> They <S%H3559>make<s%> <S%H3559>ready<s%> their <S%H2671>arrow<s%> upon the <S%H9199>string,<s%> To <S%H3384>shoot<s%> in <S%H652>darkness<s%> at the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is in His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple;<s%> the Lord's <S%H3678>throne<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>behold,<s%> His <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> <S%H974>test<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H974>tests<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> And the one who <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> His <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8130>hates.<s%>

Upon the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> He will <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H6341>snares;<s%> <S%H784>Fire<s%> and <S%H1614>brimstone<s%> and <S%H2152>burning<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> will be the <S%H4521>portion<s%> of their <S%H3563>cup.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> He <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness;<s%> The <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H2372>behold<s%> His <S%H6440>face.<s%>
